name: theme-switcher
description: Settings section to switch and customize UI themes

scripts.copy_lib: node -e "try { require('copyfiles')('-u 4 node_modules/font-scanner/build/Release/fontmanager.node dist'); } catch(e) { console.log('Skipping font-scanner copy on non-Windows platforms'); }"
scripts.compile_scss_disabled: echo 'SCSS compilation disabled - StyleManager handles runtime compilation'
scripts.copy_themes: yarn copyfiles themes/**/*.scss themes/**/*.json themes/**/*.md dist
scripts.copy_to_out: rm -rf ../../out/bundledPlugins/theme-switcher && mkdir -p ../../out/bundledPlugins/theme-switcher && rsync -av dist/ ../../out/bundledPlugins/theme-switcher/ && cp info.json ../../out/bundledPlugins/theme-switcher/
scripts.build: yarn run webpack && yarn run copy_themes && yarn run copy_lib && yarn run copy_to_out && yarn run copy_to_app
scripts.copy_js_to_out: sh -c 'if ls out/*.js 1> /dev/null 2>&1; then rsync -av out/*.js out/*.js.map ../../out/bundledPlugins/theme-switcher/ 2>/dev/null || true; fi'

author: Black Tree Gaming Ltd.
